Company Description: An AI-powered online fundraising platform for nonprofits, designed to optimize donations, increase conversions, and integrate with existing websites. It offers tools like customizable donation forms, recurring giving options, and supports various payment methods and currencies. Used by organizations like UNICEF USA and The Salvation Army UK.

A global job board and search engine specializing in remote and flexible work opportunities. It uses AI to match candidates with suitable roles and provides detailed information on remote work conditions. Primarily serves startups, scale-ups, and small businesses.
